facts.attributes.custom_flags.why: Backend contains specific product attribute 'custom_flags' which is not present on the webpage. Surfacing it may enhance marketing and filtering.
facts.attributes.custom_flags.implementation_notes: Add this attribute under facts.attributes.custom_flags on the webpage.

facts.attributes.hts_code.why: HTS code is important for compliance and customs purposes and is available in backend but missing on the webpage.
facts.attributes.hts_code.implementation_notes: Surface the HTS code under facts.attributes.hts_code.

facts.attributes.new_arrival.why: Indicates product arrival status; backend states 'no' which can inform shopper expectations.

facts.attributes.preorder_item.why: Preorder status is 'no' in the backend, clarifying availability.

facts.attributes.shopper_group_id.why: Shopper group IDs can be useful for personalization or filtering, found in backend but missing on webpage.

facts.attributes.weight.why: Product weight (1.5) is in backend but missing on webpage; important for shipping and logistics info.

facts.variants.summary.why: Backend offers explicit color and size variant info with stock status, webpage only shows variant skus; summarizing variants improves shopper clarity.
facts.variants.summary.implementation_notes: Add a concise summary list of variants characteristics, including stock info.

facts.facets.category_path.why: No explicit category path is on the webpage though the product fits apparel/t-shirt categories. Adding relevant category paths improves faceting/filtering.
facts.facets.category_path.implementation_notes: Assign category path based on product type and typical categorization: Apparel > T-Shirts > Graphic Tees.

pdp.feature_bullets.why: The backend rich description contains detailed, factual info about fabric, branding, and pricing that is missing from webpage; bullets improve scannability.

intent.target_personas.implementation_notes: Define likely personas for better targeting and retrieval.

catalog.seo.title_tag.why: Expands on the overly minimal current title by including color, style, and unisex sizing to improve SEO and shopper clarity without keyword stuffing.
catalog.seo.title_tag.implementation_notes: Enhance the title_tag by appending key attributes like color (Heather Gray) and unisex sizing for clearer search relevance.

catalog.seo.meta_description.why: Replaces the minimal meta description with a concise summary of product key features (fabric, color, branding, sizes, and sale price) to improve clickthrough and SEO.

catalog.seo.meta_description.implementation_notes: Use backend rich description and pricing info to craft an informative, natural meta description within length limits.

catalog.seo.h1.why: Adds more detail to the page's main heading than the current minimal text, reflecting the product’s key visual and sizing attributes for better user experience and SEO distinctiveness.

catalog.seo.h1.implementation_notes: Update h1 to a richer descriptive text that complements the title_tag and meta_description without redundancy.

catalog.pdp.title.why: Aligns the displayed product title to reflect the key color attribute 'Heather Gray' explicitly, improving shopper clarity and SEO alignment with backend facts.
catalog.pdp.title.implementation_notes: Include 'Heather Gray' in the pdp.title field so frontend can show a clearer product name.

conflicts_resolved.rationale: The seo_visible_content_optimization_task version includes the color attribute 'Heather Gray' which aligns with backend product attributes and complements SEO title and meta tags for coherence and clarity. It is factually correct and more informative.

chosen.value: Calling all shape builders. Heather gray tee with Adobe Illustrator, Member on the front. Shape Builders Design Fitness Center illustration on the back. Soft, mid-weight tee is 52% airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester, 4.2oz. Unisex sizing.

conflicts_resolved.rationale: Per the merging rules, 'pdp.' keys get selected based on factual consistency and coherence with SEO tags and backend data. validation.notes: Output matches expected keys and types exactly, merging follows priority rules with consistent factual alignment to backend and coherence with SEO tags.
